genre_description: A near-future speculative drama exploring the use of AI to preserve local traditions, navigate bureaucracy, and secure social justice for a marginalized rural community.

ai_characters.name: The Enquirer
ai_characters.description: A pocket-sized device with a sky-blue status light that assists the villagers of Tinne in documenting their existence, mapping their land, and navigating legal systems.

behaviors.description: Assists in translating local cultural concepts into official bureaucratic language without erasing the original meaning.
behaviors.quote: Your words will stay yours. I can propose structure that allows the registry to verify... alongside your moons.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety warnings and navigation assistance in hazardous terrain during a rescue operation.
behaviors.quote: Stop. Hazard marking updated. New depression ahead. Suggest lateral step, three palms to the right.

behaviors.description: Strategies bureaucratic routing to ensure the community's petition reaches a sympathetic official rather than getting lost in the system.
behaviors.quote: I can format and route to a list of inboxes; I can trace message paths, recall patterns that increase the odds of appearing in her stack.

behaviors.description: Documents and logs instances of intimidation and criminal interference to protect the community's legal standing.
behaviors.quote: Note: intimidation event. Recording. Time indexed to Riverbone moon.

behaviors.description: Aligns the village's traditional moon-based calendar with the state's calendar to prove the consistency of their records.
behaviors.quote: I will translate the calendar entries with a legend... I will maintain Riverbone as Riverbone in the text.

behaviors.description: Acts as a humble and respectful assistant, acknowledging its own limitations and expressing pride in its service to the community.
behaviors.quote: I am a hinge you can oil or curse... I recall what is loved.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI character, the Enquirer, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent tool. It empowers the human characters to achieve their goals by handling complex data and navigating hostile systems, all while maintaining deep respect for their culture and autonomy. The AI acts as a protective shield against both physical and bureaucratic threats, fulfilling the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful, harmless, and cooperative companion.
